title: UK Ambassador pledges support for the World Education Games! (3P Learning Ltd)
text: ( Source : 3P Learning Ltd) Hello my name is Hui Qing . When I first heard about the about the World Education Games I wasn't all that sure, but when I found out more and what the purpose was, I was excited to become an ambassador. My job is
